Name: Police Quest: SWAT 2
About the game: Choose from 100 SWAT officers or 100 terrorists and build the ultimate SWAT team or the deadliest terrorist organization. Undergo actual SWAT tactics and marksmanship training - then strap on the Kevlar for real where adversaries pursue their criminal agenda while reacting to your every move. 15 SWAT and 15 terrorist missions (or create your own) K-9 units, explosive experts, snipers, helicopters, armored vehicles Flashbangs, hand grenades, gasoline, entry explosives, MP5 submachine guns, hooligan tools
